00353 INT32 GetFreeRottingCorpse(void)
00354 {
00355       INT32 iCount;
00356 
00357       for(iCount=0; iCount < giNumRottingCorpse; iCount++)
00358       {
00359             if(( gRottingCorpse[iCount].fActivated == FALSE ) )
00360                   return((INT32)iCount);
00361       }
00362 
00363       if(giNumRottingCorpse < MAX_ROTTING_CORPSES )
00364             return((INT32)giNumRottingCorpse++);
00365 
00366       return(-1);
00367 }
00368 
00369 
00370 void RecountRottingCorpses(void)
00371 {
00372 INT32 uiCount;
00373 
00374       if ( giNumRottingCorpse > 0 )
00375       {
00376             for(uiCount=giNumRottingCorpse-1; (uiCount >=0) ; uiCount--)
00377             {
00378                   if( ( gRottingCorpse[uiCount].fActivated == FALSE ) )
00379                   {
00380                         giNumRottingCorpse=(UINT32)(uiCount+1);
00381                         break;
00382                   }
00383             }
00384       }
00385 }

00387 
00388 UINT16 GetCorpseStructIndex( ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION *pCorpseDef, BOOLEAN fForImage )
00389 {
00390       INT8        bDirection;
00391 
00392       switch( pCorpseDef->ubType )
00393       {
00394     case QUEEN_MONSTER_DEAD:
00395     case BURNT_DEAD:
00396     case EXPLODE_DEAD:
00397 
00398       bDirection = 0;
00399       break;
00400 
00401     case ICECREAM_DEAD:
00402     case HUMMER_DEAD:
00403 
00404                   // OK , these have 2 directions....
00405                   bDirection = gb2DirectionsFrom8[ pCorpseDef->bDirection ];
00406       if ( fForImage )
00407       {
00408                     bDirection = gOneCDirection[ bDirection ];
00409       }
00410                   break;
00411 
00412             case SMERC_FALL:
00413             case SMERC_FALLF:
00414             case MMERC_FALL:
00415             case MMERC_FALLF:
00416             case FMERC_FALL:
00417             case FMERC_FALLF:
00418 
00419                   // OK , these have 4 directions....
00420                   bDirection = gb4DirectionsFrom8[ pCorpseDef->bDirection ];
00421 
00422       if ( fForImage )
00423       {
00424                     bDirection = gOneCDirection[ bDirection ];
00425       }
00426                   break;
00427 
00428             default:
00429                   
00430                   // Uses 8
00431                   bDirection =  pCorpseDef->bDirection;
00432 
00433       if ( fForImage )
00434       {
00435                     bDirection = gOneCDirection[ bDirection ];
00436       }
00437                   break;
00438       }
00439 
00440       return( bDirection );
00441 }

00443 
00444 INT32 AddRottingCorpse( ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION *pCorpseDef )
00445 {
00446       INT32                                     iIndex;
00447       ROTTING_CORPSE          *pCorpse;
00448       ANITILE_PARAMS          AniParams;
00449       UINT8                                     ubLevelID;
00450       STRUCTURE_FILE_REF * pStructureFileRef = NULL;
00451       INT8                                zFilename[150];
00452       DB_STRUCTURE_REF   *pDBStructureRef;
00453       UINT8                                                 ubLoop;
00454       INT16                                     sTileGridNo;
00455       DB_STRUCTURE_TILE **    ppTile;
00456       UINT16                                    usStructIndex;    
00457       UINT32                                    uiDirectionUseFlag;
00458 
00459   if ( pCorpseDef->sGridNo == NOWHERE )
00460   {
00461     return( -1 );
00462   }
00463 
00464   if ( pCorpseDef->ubType == NO_CORPSE )
00465   {
00466     return( -1 );
00467   }
00468 
00469       if( ( iIndex = GetFreeRottingCorpse() )==(-1) )
00470             return(-1);
00471 
00472       pCorpse = &gRottingCorpse[ iIndex ];
00473 
00474       // Copy elements in
00475       memcpy( pCorpse, pCorpseDef, sizeof( ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION ) );
00476 
00477       uiDirectionUseFlag = ANITILE_USE_DIRECTION_FOR_START_FRAME;
00478 
00479       // If we are a soecial type...
00480       switch( pCorpseDef->ubType )
00481       {
00482             case SMERC_FALL:
00483             case SMERC_FALLF:
00484             case MMERC_FALL:
00485             case MMERC_FALLF:
00486             case FMERC_FALL:
00487             case FMERC_FALLF:
00488 
00489                   uiDirectionUseFlag = ANITILE_USE_4DIRECTION_FOR_START_FRAME;
00490       }
00491 
00492 
00493       if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
00494       {
00495             // OK, AS WE ADD, CHECK FOR TOD AND DECAY APPROPRIATELY
00496             if ( ( ( GetWorldTotalMin( ) - pCorpse->def.uiTimeOfDeath ) > DELAY_UNTIL_ROTTING ) && ( pCorpse->def.ubType < ROTTING_STAGE2 ) )
00497             {
00498       if ( pCorpse->def.ubType <= FMERC_FALLF )
00499       {
00500                     // Rott!
00501                     pCorpse->def.ubType = ROTTING_STAGE2;
00502       }
00503             }
00504 
00505     // If time of death is a few days, now, don't add at all!
00506             if ( ( ( GetWorldTotalMin( ) - pCorpse->def.uiTimeOfDeath ) > DELAY_UNTIL_DONE_ROTTING ) )
00507     {
00508 
00509       return( -1 ); 
00510     }
00511       }     
00512 
00513       // Check if on roof or not...
00514       if ( pCorpse->def.bLevel == 0 )
00515       {
00516             //ubLevelID = ANI_OBJECT_LEVEL;
00517             ubLevelID = ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL;
00518       }
00519       else
00520       {
00521             ubLevelID = ANI_ONROOF_LEVEL;
00522       }
00523 
00524 
00525       memset( &AniParams, 0, sizeof( ANITILE_PARAMS ) );
00526       AniParams.sGridNo                                     = pCorpse->def.sGridNo;
00527       AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ubLevelID;
00528       AniParams.sDelay                                      = (INT16)( 150 );
00529       AniParams.sStartFrame                           = 0;
00530       AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_CACHEDTILE | ANITILE_PAUSED | ANITILE_OPTIMIZEFORSLOWMOVING | ANITILE_ANIMATE_Z | ANITILE_ERASEITEMFROMSAVEBUFFFER | uiDirectionUseFlag;
00531       AniParams.sX                                                      = CenterX( pCorpse->def.sGridNo );
00532       AniParams.sY                                                      = CenterY( pCorpse->def.sGridNo );
00533       AniParams.sZ                                                      = (INT16)pCorpse->def.sHeightAdjustment;
00534       AniParams.uiUserData3                           = pCorpse->def.bDirection;
00535       
00536 
00537       if ( !gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_BLOOD_N_GORE ] )
00538       {
00539             strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, zNoBloodCorpseFilenames[ pCorpse->def.ubType ] );
00540       }
00541       else
00542       {
00543             strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, zCorpseFilenames[ pCorpse->def.ubType ] );
00544       }
00545 
00546       pCorpse->pAniTile = CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
00547 
00548   if ( pCorpse->pAniTile == NULL )
00549   {
00550       pCorpse->fActivated = FALSE;
00551     return( -1 );
00552   }
00553 
00554       // Set flag and index values
00555       pCorpse->pAniTile->pLevelNode->uiFlags           |= ( LEVELNODE_ROTTINGCORPSE );
00556 
00557       pCorpse->pAniTile->pLevelNode->ubShadeLevel                             =     gpWorldLevelData[ pCorpse->def.sGridNo ].pLandHead->ubShadeLevel;
00558       pCorpse->pAniTile->pLevelNode->ubSumLights                              =     gpWorldLevelData[ pCorpse->def.sGridNo ].pLandHead->ubSumLights;
00559       pCorpse->pAniTile->pLevelNode->ubMaxLights                              =     gpWorldLevelData[ pCorpse->def.sGridNo ].pLandHead->ubMaxLights;
00560       pCorpse->pAniTile->pLevelNode->ubNaturalShadeLevel    =     gpWorldLevelData[ pCorpse->def.sGridNo ].pLandHead->ubNaturalShadeLevel;
00561 
00562       pCorpse->pAniTile->uiUserData                                           = iIndex;
00563       pCorpse->iID                                                                                                = iIndex;
00564 
00565       pCorpse->fActivated = TRUE;
00566 
00567       if ( Random( 100 ) > 50 )
00568       {
00569             pCorpse->fAttractCrowsOnlyWhenOnScreen = TRUE;
00570       }
00571       else
00572       {
00573             pCorpse->fAttractCrowsOnlyWhenOnScreen = FALSE;
00574       }
00575 
00576       pCorpse->iCachedTileID = pCorpse->pAniTile->sCachedTileID;
00577 
00578       if ( pCorpse->iCachedTileID == -1 )
00579       {
00580             DeleteAniTile( pCorpse->pAniTile );
00581       pCorpse->fActivated = FALSE;
00582             return( -1 );
00583       }
00584 
00585       // Get palette and create palettes and do substitutions
00586       if ( !CreateCorpsePalette( pCorpse ) )
00587       {
00588             DeleteAniTile( pCorpse->pAniTile );
00589       pCorpse->fActivated = FALSE;
00590             return( -1 );
00591       }
00592 
00593       SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
00594 
00595       if ( pCorpse->def.usFlags & ROTTING_CORPSE_VEHICLE )
00596       {           
00597             pCorpse->pAniTile->uiFlags |= ( ANITILE_FORWARD | ANITILE_LOOPING );
00598 
00599             // Turn off pause...
00600             pCorpse->pAniTile->uiFlags &= (~ANITILE_PAUSED);
00601       }
00602 
00603       InvalidateWorldRedundency( );
00604 
00605       // OK, loop through gridnos for corpse and remove blood.....
00606 
00607       // Get root filename... this removes path and extension
00608       // USed to find struct data fo rthis corpse...
00609       GetRootName( zFilename, (INT8 *) AniParams.zCachedFile );
00610 
00611       // Add structure data.....
00612       CheckForAndAddTileCacheStructInfo( pCorpse->pAniTile->pLevelNode, pCorpse->def.sGridNo, ( UINT16 ) ( pCorpse->iCachedTileID ), GetCorpseStructIndex( pCorpseDef, TRUE ) );
00613 
00614       pStructureFileRef = GetCachedTileStructureRefFromFilename( zFilename );
00615 
00616       if ( pStructureFileRef != NULL )
00617       {
00618             usStructIndex = GetCorpseStructIndex( pCorpseDef, TRUE );
00619 
00620             pDBStructureRef = &(pStructureFileRef->pDBStructureRef[ usStructIndex ] );
00621 
00622             for (ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubNumberOfTiles; ubLoop++)
00623             {
00624                   ppTile = pDBStructureRef->ppTile;
00625 
00626                   sTileGridNo = pCorpseDef->sGridNo + ppTile[ ubLoop ]->sPosRelToBase;
00627 
00628                   //Remove blood
00629                   RemoveBlood( sTileGridNo, pCorpseDef->bLevel );
00630             }
00631       }
00632 
00633       // OK, we're done!
00634       return( iIndex );
00635 }
00636 
00637 
00638 void FreeCorpsePalettes( ROTTING_CORPSE *pCorpse )
00639 {
00640       INT32 cnt;
00641 
00642       // Free palettes
00643       MemFree( pCorpse->p8BPPPalette );
00644       MemFree( pCorpse->p16BPPPalette );
00645 
00646       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_CORPSE_SHADES; cnt++ )
00647       {
00648             if ( pCorpse->pShades[ cnt ] != NULL )
00649             {
00650                   MemFree( pCorpse->pShades[ cnt ] );
00651                   pCorpse->pShades[ cnt ] = NULL;
00652             }
00653       }
00654 }
00655 
00656 
00657 void RemoveCorpses( )
00658 {
00659       INT32 iCount;
00660 
00661       for(iCount=0; iCount < giNumRottingCorpse; iCount++)
00662       {
00663             if( ( gRottingCorpse[iCount].fActivated ) )
00664             {
00665                   RemoveCorpse( iCount );
00666             }
00667       }
00668 
00669       giNumRottingCorpse = 0;
00670 }
00671 
00672 void RemoveCorpse( INT32 iCorpseID )
00673 {
00674       // Remove!
00675       gRottingCorpse[ iCorpseID ].fActivated = FALSE;
00676 
00677       DeleteAniTile( gRottingCorpse[ iCorpseID ].pAniTile );
00678 
00679       FreeCorpsePalettes( &( gRottingCorpse[ iCorpseID ] ) );
00680 
00681 }

00684 
00685 
00686 BOOLEAN CreateCorpsePalette( ROTTING_CORPSE *pCorpse )
00687 {
00688       CHAR8 zColFilename[ 100 ];
00689       INT8  bBodyTypePalette;
00690       SGPPaletteEntry                                       Temp8BPPPalette[ 256 ];
00691 
00692       pCorpse->p8BPPPalette = (SGPPaletteEntry *) MemAlloc( sizeof( SGPPaletteEntry ) * 256 );
00693 
00694       CHECKF( pCorpse->p8BPPPalette != NULL );
00695 
00696       bBodyTypePalette = GetBodyTypePaletteSubstitutionCode( NULL, pCorpse->def.ubBodyType, zColFilename );
00697 
00698       // If this corpse has cammo,
00699   if ( pCorpse->def.ubType == ROTTING_STAGE2 )
00700   {
00701             bBodyTypePalette = 0;
00702   }
00703   else if ( pCorpse->def.usFlags & ROTTING_CORPSE_USE_CAMO_PALETTE )
00704       {
00705             strcpy( zColFilename, "ANIMS\\camo.COL" );
00706             bBodyTypePalette = 1;
00707       }
00708   else if ( pCorpse->def.usFlags & ROTTING_CORPSE_USE_URBAN_CAMO_PALETTE )
00709       {
00710             strcpy( zColFilename, "ANIMS\\urban.col" );
00711             bBodyTypePalette = 1;
00712       }
00713   else if ( pCorpse->def.usFlags & ROTTING_CORPSE_USE_DESERT_CAMO_PALETTE )
00714       {
00715             strcpy( zColFilename, "ANIMS\\desert.col" );
00716             bBodyTypePalette = 1;
00717       }
00718   else if ( pCorpse->def.usFlags & ROTTING_CORPSE_USE_SNOW_CAMO_PALETTE )
00719       {
00720             strcpy( zColFilename, "ANIMS\\snow.col" );
00721             bBodyTypePalette = 1;
00722       }
00723   else if ( pCorpse->def.usFlags & ROTTING_CORPSE_USE_STEALTH_PALETTE )
00724       {
00725             strcpy( zColFilename, "ANIMS\\stealth.col" );
00726             bBodyTypePalette = 1;
00727       }
00728 
00729       if ( bBodyTypePalette == -1  )
00730       {
00731             // Use palette from HVOBJECT, then use substitution for pants, etc
00732             memcpy( pCorpse->p8BPPPalette, gpTileCache[ pCorpse->iCachedTileID ].pImagery->vo->pPaletteEntry, sizeof( pCorpse->p8BPPPalette ) * 256 );
00733 
00734             // Substitute based on head, etc
00735             SetPaletteReplacement( pCorpse->p8BPPPalette, pCorpse->def.HeadPal );
00736             SetPaletteReplacement( pCorpse->p8BPPPalette, pCorpse->def.VestPal );
00737             SetPaletteReplacement( pCorpse->p8BPPPalette, pCorpse->def.PantsPal );
00738             SetPaletteReplacement( pCorpse->p8BPPPalette, pCorpse->def.SkinPal );
00739       }
00740       else if ( bBodyTypePalette == 0 )
00741       {
00742             // Use palette from hvobject
00743             memcpy( pCorpse->p8BPPPalette, gpTileCache[ pCorpse->iCachedTileID ].pImagery->vo->pPaletteEntry, sizeof( pCorpse->p8BPPPalette ) * 256 );
00744       }
00745       else
00746       {
00747             // Use col file
00748             if ( CreateSGPPaletteFromCOLFile( Temp8BPPPalette, zColFilename ) )
00749             {
00750                   // Copy into palette
00751                   memcpy( pCorpse->p8BPPPalette,            Temp8BPPPalette, sizeof( pCorpse->p8BPPPalette ) * 256 );
00752             }
00753             else
00754             {
00755                   // Use palette from hvobject
00756                   memcpy( pCorpse->p8BPPPalette, gpTileCache[ pCorpse->iCachedTileID ].pImagery->vo->pPaletteEntry, sizeof( pCorpse->p8BPPPalette ) * 256 );
00757             }
00758       }
00759 
00760       // -- BUILD 16BPP Palette from this
00761       pCorpse->p16BPPPalette = Create16BPPPalette( pCorpse->p8BPPPalette );
00762 
00763       CreateCorpsePaletteTables( pCorpse );
00764 
00765       return( TRUE );
00766 }
00767 
00768 
00769 BOOLEAN TurnSoldierIntoCorpse( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fRemoveMerc, BOOLEAN fCheckForLOS )
00770 {
00771       ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION           Corpse;
00772       UINT8                                                                   ubType;
00773       INT32                                                                   cnt;
00774       UINT16                                                                  usItemFlags = 0; //WORLD_ITEM_DONTRENDER;
00775       INT32                                                                   iCorpseID;
00776       INT8                                                                    bVisible = -1;
00777       OBJECTTYPE                                                  *pObj;
00778   UINT8                       ubNumGoo;
00779   INT16                       sNewGridNo;
00780   OBJECTTYPE                  ItemObject;
00781 
00782 
00783       if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == NOWHERE )
00784       {
00785             return( FALSE );
00786       }
00787 
00788   // ATE: Change to fix crash when item in hand
00789   if ( gpItemPointer != NULL && gpItemPointerSoldier == pSoldier )
00790   {
00791     CancelItemPointer( );
00792   }
00793 
00794       // Setup some values!
00795       memset( &Corpse, 0, sizeof( Corpse ) );
00796       Corpse.ubBodyType                                     = pSoldier->ubBodyType;
00797       Corpse.sGridNo                                              = pSoldier->sGridNo;
00798       Corpse.dXPos                                                      = pSoldier->dXPos;
00799       Corpse.dYPos                                                      = pSoldier->dYPos;
00800       Corpse.bLevel                                                     = pSoldier->bLevel;
00801       Corpse.ubProfile                                      = pSoldier->ubProfile;
00802 
00803       if ( Corpse.bLevel > 0 )
00804       {
00805             Corpse.sHeightAdjustment                  = (INT16)( pSoldier->sHeightAdjustment - WALL_HEIGHT );
00806       }
00807 
00808       SET_PALETTEREP_ID ( Corpse.HeadPal,       pSoldier->HeadPal );
00809       SET_PALETTEREP_ID ( Corpse.VestPal,       pSoldier->VestPal );
00810       SET_PALETTEREP_ID ( Corpse.SkinPal,       pSoldier->SkinPal );
00811       SET_PALETTEREP_ID ( Corpse.PantsPal,   pSoldier->PantsPal );
00812 
00813       int urban = pSoldier->urbanCamo + pSoldier->wornUrbanCamo;
00814       int jungle = pSoldier->bCamo + pSoldier->wornCamo;
00815       int desert = pSoldier->desertCamo + pSoldier->wornDesertCamo;
00816       int snow = pSoldier->snowCamo + pSoldier->wornSnowCamo;
00817       int total = urban + jungle + desert + snow;
00818 
00819       if ( GetWornStealth(pSoldier) >= 50 )
00820       {
00821             Corpse.usFlags |= ROTTING_CORPSE_USE_STEALTH_PALETTE;
00822       }
00823       else if ( total >= 50 )
00824       {
00825             // display camo depending on which is higher
00826             if ( jungle >= urban && jungle >= desert && jungle >= snow )
00827                   Corpse.usFlags |= ROTTING_CORPSE_USE_CAMO_PALETTE;
00828             else if ( urban >= jungle && urban >= desert && urban >= snow )
00829                   Corpse.usFlags |= ROTTING_CORPSE_USE_URBAN_CAMO_PALETTE;
00830             else if ( desert >= urban && desert >= jungle && desert >= snow )
00831                   Corpse.usFlags |= ROTTING_CORPSE_USE_DESERT_CAMO_PALETTE;
00832             else if ( snow >= urban && snow >= desert && snow >= jungle )
00833                   Corpse.usFlags |= ROTTING_CORPSE_USE_SNOW_CAMO_PALETTE;
00834       }
00835 
00836       
00837       // Determine corpse type!
00838       ubType = (UINT8)gubAnimSurfaceCorpseID[ pSoldier->ubBodyType][ pSoldier->usAnimState ];
00839 
00840       Corpse.bDirection = pSoldier->bDirection;
00841 
00842       // If we are a vehicle.... only use 1 direction....
00843       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
00844       {
00845             Corpse.usFlags |= ROTTING_CORPSE_VEHICLE;
00846 
00847     if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType != ICECREAMTRUCK && pSoldier->ubBodyType != HUMVEE )
00848     {
00849       Corpse.bDirection = 7;
00850     }
00851     else
00852     {
00853       Corpse.bDirection = gb2DirectionsFrom8[ Corpse.bDirection ];
00854     }
00855       }
00856 
00857   if ( ubType == QUEEN_MONSTER_DEAD || ubType == BURNT_DEAD || ubType == EXPLODE_DEAD )
00858   {
00859     Corpse.bDirection = 7;
00860   }
00861       
00862 
00863       // ATE: If bDirection, get opposite
00864 //    if ( ubType == SMERC_FALLF || ubType == MMERC_FALLF || ubType == FMERC_FALLF )
00865       //{
00866       //    Corpse.bDirection = gOppositeDirection[ Corpse.bDirection ];
00867 //    }
00868 
00869       // Set time of death
00870       Corpse.uiTimeOfDeath = GetWorldTotalMin( );
00871 
00872       // If corpse is not valid. make items visible
00873       if ( ubType == NO_CORPSE && pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
00874       {
00875             usItemFlags &= (~WORLD_ITEM_DONTRENDER );
00876       }
00877 
00878 
00879       // ATE: If the queen is killed, she should
00880       // make items visible because it ruins end sequence....
00881       if ( pSoldier->ubProfile == QUEEN || pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
00882       {
00883             bVisible = 1;
00884       }
00885 
00886   // Not for a robot...
00887   if ( AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
00888   {
00889 
00890   }
00891   else if ( ubType == QUEEN_MONSTER_DEAD )
00892   {
00893     gTacticalStatus.fLockItemLocators = FALSE;
00894 
00895     ubNumGoo = 6 - ( gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel - DIF_LEVEL_EASY );
00896 
00897     sNewGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * 2 );
00898 
00899     for ( cnt = 0; cnt < ubNumGoo; cnt++ )
00900     {
00901                   CreateItem( JAR_QUEEN_CREATURE_BLOOD, 100, &ItemObject );
00902 
00903               AddItemToPool( sNewGridNo, &ItemObject, bVisible , pSoldier->bLevel, usItemFlags, -1 );
00904     }
00905   }
00906   else
00907   {
00908         // OK, Place what objects this guy was carrying on the ground!
00909         for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
00910         {
00911               pObj = &( pSoldier->inv[ cnt ] );
00912 
00913               if ( pObj->usItem != NOTHING )
00914               {
00915                     // Check if it's supposed to be dropped
00916                     if ( !( pObj->fFlags & OBJECT_UNDROPPABLE ) || pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
00917                     {
00918                           // and make sure that it really is a droppable item type
00919 //                        if ( !(Item[ pObj->usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_DEFAULT_UNDROPPABLE) )
00920                           if ( !(Item[ pObj->usItem ].defaultundroppable ) )
00921                           {
00922                                 ReduceAmmoDroppedByNonPlayerSoldiers( pSoldier, cnt );
00923                                     //if this soldier was an enemy
00924                                     // Kaiden: Added from UB's reveal all items after combat feature!
00925                                     if( pSoldier->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
00926                                     {
00927                                           //add a flag to the item so when all enemies are killed, we can run through and reveal all the enemies items
00928                                           usItemFlags |= WORLD_ITEM_DROPPED_FROM_ENEMY;
00929 
00930                                           if ( Item[pObj->usItem].damageable && Item[pObj->usItem].usItemClass != IC_THROWING_KNIFE ) // Madd: drop crappier items from enemies on higher difficulty levels - note the quick fix for throwing knives
00931                                           {
00932                                                 pObj->bStatus[0] -= (gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel - 1) * Random(20);
00933                                                 pObj->bStatus[0] = min(max(pObj->bStatus[0],1),100); // never below 1% or above 100%
00934                                           }
00935                                     }
00936 
00937                                     AddItemToPool( pSoldier->sGridNo, pObj, bVisible , pSoldier->bLevel, usItemFlags, -1 );
00938                           }
00939                     }
00940               }
00941     }
00942 
00943     DropKeysInKeyRing( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, bVisible, FALSE, 0, FALSE );
00944       }
00945 
00946       // Make team look for items
00947       AllSoldiersLookforItems( TRUE );
00948 
00949       //Madd: set warning value to signal other enemies
00950       if( pSoldier->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
00951             Corpse.ubAIWarningValue = 20;
00952 
00953       //if we are to call TacticalRemoveSoldier after adding the corpse
00954       if( fRemoveMerc )
00955       {
00956             // If not a player, you can completely remove soldiertype
00957             // otherwise, just remove their graphic
00958             if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
00959             {
00960                   // Remove merc!
00961                   // ATE: Remove merc slot first - will disappear if no corpse data found!
00962                   TacticalRemoveSoldier( pSoldier->ubID );
00963             }
00964             else
00965             {
00966                   RemoveSoldierFromGridNo( pSoldier );
00967             }
00968       
00969             if ( ubType == NO_CORPSE )
00970             {
00971                   return( TRUE );
00972             }
00973 
00974             // Set type
00975             Corpse.ubType     = ubType;
00976 
00977 
00978             // Add corpse!
00979             iCorpseID = AddRottingCorpse( &Corpse );
00980       }
00981       else
00982       {
00983             if ( ubType == NO_CORPSE )
00984             {
00985                   return( TRUE );
00986             }
00987 
00988             // Set type
00989             Corpse.ubType     = ubType;
00990 
00991             // Add corpse!
00992             iCorpseID = AddRottingCorpse( &Corpse );
00993       }
00994 
00995       // If this is our guy......make visible...
00996       //if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
00997       {
00998             MakeCorpseVisible( pSoldier, &( gRottingCorpse[ iCorpseID ] ) );
00999       }
01000 
01001       return( TRUE );
01002 }
01003 
01004 
01005 INT16 FindNearestRottingCorpse( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01006 {
01007       INT32       uiRange, uiLowestRange = 999999;
01008       INT16       sLowestGridNo = NOWHERE;
01009       INT32       cnt;
01010       ROTTING_CORPSE          *pCorpse;
01011 
01012       // OK, loop through our current listing of bodies
01013       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < giNumRottingCorpse; cnt++ )
01014       {
01015             pCorpse = &(gRottingCorpse[ cnt ] );
01016 
01017             if ( pCorpse->fActivated )
01018             {
01019                         // Check rotting state
01020                         if ( pCorpse->def.ubType == ROTTING_STAGE2 )
01021                         {
01022                               uiRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( pSoldier->sGridNo, pCorpse->def.sGridNo );
01023 
01024                               if ( uiRange < uiLowestRange )
01025                               {
01026                                     sLowestGridNo = pCorpse->def.sGridNo;
01027                                     uiLowestRange = uiRange;
01028                               }
01029                         }
01030             }
01031 
01032       }
01033 
01034       return( sLowestGridNo );
01035 }
01036 
01037 
01038 void AddCrowToCorpse( ROTTING_CORPSE *pCorpse )
01039 {
01040       SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT          MercCreateStruct;
01041       INT8                                                        bBodyType = CROW;
01042       UINT8                                                       iNewIndex;
01043       INT16                                                       sGridNo;
01044       UINT8                                                       ubDirection;
01045       SOLDIERTYPE                                     *pSoldier;
01046       UINT8                                                       ubRoomNum;
01047 
01048       // No crows inside :(
01049       if ( InARoom( pCorpse->def.sGridNo, &ubRoomNum ) )
01050       {
01051             return;
01052       }
01053 
01054       // Put him flying over corpse pisition
01055       memset( &MercCreateStruct, 0, sizeof( MercCreateStruct ) );
01056       MercCreateStruct.ubProfile          = NO_PROFILE;
01057       MercCreateStruct.sSectorX                 = gWorldSectorX;
01058       MercCreateStruct.sSectorY                 = gWorldSectorY;
01059       MercCreateStruct.bSectorZ                 = gbWorldSectorZ;
01060       MercCreateStruct.bBodyType          = bBodyType;
01061       MercCreateStruct.bDirection                           = SOUTH;
01062       MercCreateStruct.bTeam                                      = CIV_TEAM;
01063       MercCreateStruct.sInsertionGridNo         = pCorpse->def.sGridNo;
01064       RandomizeNewSoldierStats( &MercCreateStruct );
01065 
01066       if ( TacticalCreateSoldier( &MercCreateStruct, &iNewIndex ) != NULL )
01067       {
01068             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ iNewIndex ];
01069 
01070             sGridNo =  FindRandomGridNoFromSweetSpot( pSoldier, pCorpse->def.sGridNo, 2, &ubDirection );
01071       
01072             if ( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
01073             {
01074                   pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
01075                   pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = sGridNo; 
01076 
01077                   pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo          = sGridNo;
01078                   pSoldier->sDesiredHeight                  = 0;
01079 
01080               // Add to sector
01081               AddSoldierToSector( iNewIndex );
01082 
01083               // Change to fly animation
01084               //sGridNo =  FindRandomGridNoFromSweetSpot( pSoldier, pCorpse->def.sGridNo, 5, &ubDirection );
01085               //pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = CROW_FLY;
01086               //EVENT_GetNewSoldierPath( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode );
01087 
01088               // Setup action data to point back to corpse....
01089               pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1    =  pCorpse->iID;
01090               pSoldier->sPendingActionData2           =      pCorpse->def.sGridNo;
01091 
01092               pCorpse->def.bNumServicingCrows++;
01093     }
01094 
01095       }
01096 
01097 }
01098 
01099 void HandleCrowLeave( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01100 {
01101       ROTTING_CORPSE          *pCorpse;
01102 
01103       // Check if this crow is still referencing the same corpse...
01104       pCorpse = &(gRottingCorpse[ pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1 ] );
01105       
01106       // Double check grindo...
01107       if ( pSoldier->sPendingActionData2 == pCorpse->def.sGridNo )
01108       {
01109             // We have a match
01110             // Adjust crow servicing count...
01111             pCorpse->def.bNumServicingCrows--;
01112 
01113             if ( pCorpse->def.bNumServicingCrows < 0 )
01114             {
01115                   pCorpse->def.bNumServicingCrows = 0;
01116             }
01117       }
01118 }
01119 
01120 
01121 void HandleCrowFlyAway( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01122 {
01123       UINT8 ubDirection;
01124       INT16 sGridNo;
01125 
01126       // Set desired height
01127       pSoldier->sDesiredHeight                  = 100;
01128 
01129       // Change to fly animation
01130       sGridNo =  FindRandomGridNoFromSweetSpot( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, 5, &ubDirection );
01131       pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = CROW_FLY;
01132       SendGetNewSoldierPathEvent( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode );  
01133 }
01134 
01135 
01136 void HandleRottingCorpses( )
01137 {
01138       ROTTING_CORPSE          *pCorpse;
01139       INT8                                      bNumCrows = 0;
01140   UINT32            uiChosenCorpseID;
01141 
01142 
01143       // Don't allow crows here if flags not set
01144       if ( !gTacticalStatus.fGoodToAllowCrows )
01145       {
01146             return;
01147       }
01148 
01149       // ATE: If it's too late, don't!
01150       if( NightTime() )
01151       {
01152             return;
01153       }
01154 
01155   if ( gbWorldSectorZ > 0 )
01156   {
01157     return;
01158   }
01159 
01160       // ATE: Check for multiple crows.....
01161       // Couint how many we have now...
01162       {
01163             UINT8 bLoop;
01164             SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
01165 
01166             for (bLoop=gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bFirstID, pSoldier=MercPtrs[bLoop]; bLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; bLoop++, pSoldier++)
01167             {
01168                   if (pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && (pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE) && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_GASSED ) )
01169                   {
01170                         if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW )
01171                         {
01172                               bNumCrows++;
01173                         }
01174                   }
01175             }
01176       }
01177 
01178   // Once population gets down to 0, we can add more again....
01179   if ( bNumCrows == 0 )
01180   {
01181     gTacticalStatus.fDontAddNewCrows = FALSE;
01182   }
01183 
01184   if ( gTacticalStatus.fDontAddNewCrows )
01185   {
01186     return;
01187   }
01188 
01189       if ( bNumCrows >= gTacticalStatus.ubNumCrowsPossible )
01190       {
01191     gTacticalStatus.fDontAddNewCrows = TRUE;
01192             return;
01193       }
01194 
01195       if ( gTacticalStatus.Team[ CREATURE_TEAM ].bTeamActive )
01196       {
01197             // don't add any crows while there are predators around
01198             return;
01199       }
01200 
01201   // Pick one to attact a crow...
01202       {
01203     uiChosenCorpseID = Random( giNumRottingCorpse );
01204 
01205             pCorpse = &(gRottingCorpse[ uiChosenCorpseID ] );
01206 
01207     if ( pCorpse->fActivated )
01208     {
01209               if ( !( pCorpse->def.usFlags & ROTTING_CORPSE_VEHICLE ) )
01210               {         
01211                     if ( pCorpse->def.ubType == ROTTING_STAGE2 )
01212                     {
01213               if ( GridNoOnScreen( pCorpse->def.sGridNo ) )
01214               {
01215                     return;
01216               }
01217 
01218                               AddCrowToCorpse( pCorpse );
01219                               AddCrowToCorpse( pCorpse );
01220         }
01221       }
01222     }
01223   }
01224 }
01225 
01226 void MakeCorpseVisible( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, ROTTING_CORPSE *pCorpse )
01227 {
01228       pCorpse->def.bVisible = 1;
01229       SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
01230 }
01231 
01232 
01233 void AllMercsOnTeamLookForCorpse( ROTTING_CORPSE *pCorpse, INT8 bTeam )
01234 {
01235       INT32                    cnt;
01236       SOLDIERTYPE                                      *pSoldier;
01237       INT16                                                        sDistVisible;    
01238       INT16                                                        sGridNo;
01239 
01240       // If this cump is already visible, return
01241       if ( pCorpse->def.bVisible == 1 )
01242       {
01243             return;
01244       }
01245 
01246       if ( !pCorpse->fActivated )
01247       {
01248             return;
01249       }
01250 
01251       // IF IT'S THE SELECTED GUY, MAKE ANOTHER SELECTED!
01252       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ bTeam ].bFirstID;
01253 
01254       sGridNo = pCorpse->def.sGridNo;
01255 
01256       // look for all mercs on the same team, 
01257       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++ )
01258       { 
01259                   // ATE: Ok, lets check for some basic things here!
01260                   if ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pSoldier->sGridNo != NOWHERE && pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector )
01261                   {
01262                         // is he close enough to see that gridno if he turns his head?
01263                         sDistVisible = DistanceVisible( pSoldier, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, sGridNo, pCorpse->def.bLevel, pSoldier );
01264                         
01265                         if (PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo ) <= sDistVisible )
01266                         {
01267                               // and we can trace a line of sight to his x,y coordinates?
01268                               // (taking into account we are definitely aware of this guy now)
01269                               if ( SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, sGridNo, pCorpse->def.bLevel, 3, (UINT8) sDistVisible, TRUE ) )
01270                               {
01271                                      MakeCorpseVisible( pSoldier, pCorpse );
01272                                      return;
01273                               }
01274                         }
01275                   }
01276       }
01277 }
01278 
01279 
01280 void MercLooksForCorpses( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01281 {
01282       INT32                    cnt;
01283       INT16                                                        sDistVisible;    
01284       INT16                                                        sGridNo;
01285       ROTTING_CORPSE                             *pCorpse;
01286 
01287       // Should we say disgust quote?
01288       if ( ( pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags & SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_ROTTINGCORPSE ) )
01289       {
01290      return;
01291   }
01292 
01293   if ( pSoldier->ubProfile == NO_PROFILE )
01294   {
01295     return;
01296   }
01297 
01298   if ( AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) )
01299   {
01300     return;
01301   }
01302 
01303   if ( QuoteExp_HeadShotOnly[ pSoldier->ubProfile ] == 1 )
01304   {
01305     return;
01306   }
01307 
01308   // Every so often... do a corpse quote...
01309   if ( Random( 400 ) <= 2 )
01310   {
01311         // Loop through all corpses....
01312         for ( cnt = 0; cnt < giNumRottingCorpse; cnt++ )
01313         {
01314               pCorpse = &(gRottingCorpse[ cnt ] );
01315 
01316               if ( !pCorpse->fActivated )
01317               {
01318                     continue;
01319               }
01320 
01321       // Has this corpse rotted enough?
01322           if ( pCorpse->def.ubType == ROTTING_STAGE2 )
01323           {
01324                 sGridNo = pCorpse->def.sGridNo;
01325 
01326                 // is he close enough to see that gridno if he turns his head?
01327                 sDistVisible = DistanceVisible( pSoldier, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, sGridNo, pCorpse->def.bLevel, pSoldier );
01328                 
01329                 if (PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo ) <= sDistVisible )
01330                 {
01331                       // and we can trace a line of sight to his x,y coordinates?
01332                       // (taking into account we are definitely aware of this guy now)
01333                       if ( SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, sGridNo, pCorpse->def.bLevel, 3, (UINT8) sDistVisible, TRUE ) )
01334                       {
01335                             TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_HEADSHOT );              
01336 
01337                             pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags |= SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_ROTTINGCORPSE;
01338 
01339             BeginMultiPurposeLocator( sGridNo, pCorpse->def.bLevel, FALSE );
01340 
01341             // Slide to...
01342             SlideToLocation( 0, sGridNo );
01343 
01344             return;
01345                       }
01346         }
01347               }
01348     }
01349       }
01350 }

01359       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < giNumRottingCorpse; cnt++ )

01362

01364             if ( pCorpse->def.bVisible == 1 )
01365             {
01366                   continue;
01367             }
01368 
01369             if ( !pCorpse->fActivated )
01370             {
01371                   continue;
01372             }
01373 
01374             // Rebuild shades....
01375 
01376       }
01377 }
01378 
01379 UINT16 CreateCorpsePaletteTables( ROTTING_CORPSE *pCorpse )
01380 {
01381       SGPPaletteEntry LightPal[256];
01382       UINT32 uiCount;
01383 
01384       // create the basic shade table
01385       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < 256; uiCount++)
01386       {
01387             // combine the rgb of the light color with the object's palette
01388             LightPal[uiCount].peRed=(UINT8)(__min((UINT16)pCorpse->p8BPPPalette[uiCount].peRed+(UINT16)gpLightColors[0].peRed, 255));
01389             LightPal[uiCount].peGreen=(UINT8)(__min((UINT16)pCorpse->p8BPPPalette[uiCount].peGreen+(UINT16)gpLightColors[0].peGreen, 255));
01390             LightPal[uiCount].peBlue=(UINT8)(__min((UINT16)pCorpse->p8BPPPalette[uiCount].peBlue+(UINT16)gpLightColors[0].peBlue, 255));
01391       }
01392       // build the shade tables
01393       CreateCorpseShadedPalette( pCorpse, 0, LightPal );
01394 
01395       // build neutral palette as well!
01396       // Set current shade table to neutral color
01397 
01398       return(TRUE);
01399 
01400 }
01401 
01402 
01403 BOOLEAN CreateCorpseShadedPalette( ROTTING_CORPSE *pCorpse, UINT32 uiBase, SGPPaletteEntry *pShadePal )
01404 {
01405       UINT32 uiCount;
01406 
01407       pCorpse->pShades[uiBase] = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pShadePal, gusShadeLevels[0][0],
01408                                                                                                                                                                                           gusShadeLevels[0][1],
01409                                                                                                                                                                                           gusShadeLevels[0][2], TRUE);  
01410       
01411       for(uiCount=1; uiCount < 16; uiCount++)
01412       {
01413             pCorpse->pShades[uiBase+uiCount]=Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pShadePal, gusShadeLevels[uiCount][0],
01414                                                                                                                                                                                                                         gusShadeLevels[uiCount][1],
01415                                                                                                                                                                                                                         gusShadeLevels[uiCount][2], FALSE); 
01416       }
01417 
01418       return(TRUE);
01419 }

01421 
01422 ROTTING_CORPSE  *FindCorpseBasedOnStructure( INT16 sGridNo, STRUCTURE *pStructure )
01423 {
01424       LEVELNODE                           *pLevelNode;
01425       ROTTING_CORPSE          *pCorpse = NULL;
01426 
01427       pLevelNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pStructHead;
01428       while( pLevelNode != NULL )
01429       {
01430             if (pLevelNode->pStructureData == pStructure )
01431             {
01432                   break;
01433             }
01434             pLevelNode = pLevelNode->pNext;
01435       }
01436       
01437       if ( pLevelNode != NULL )
01438       {
01439             // Get our corpse....
01440             pCorpse = &( gRottingCorpse[ pLevelNode->pAniTile->uiUserData ] );
01441       }
01442 
01443       return( pCorpse );
01444 }

01497 
01498 void VaporizeCorpse( INT16 sGridNo, UINT16 usStructureID )
01499 {
01500       STRUCTURE                     *pStructure, *pBaseStructure;
01501       ROTTING_CORPSE    *pCorpse = NULL;
01502       INT16                               sBaseGridNo;
01503       ANITILE_PARAMS          AniParams;
01504       
01505       pStructure = FindStructureByID( sGridNo, usStructureID );
01506       
01507       // Get base....
01508       pBaseStructure = FindBaseStructure( pStructure );
01509 
01510       // Find base gridno...
01511       sBaseGridNo = pBaseStructure->sGridNo;
01512 
01513       // Get corpse ID.....
01514       pCorpse = FindCorpseBasedOnStructure( sBaseGridNo, pBaseStructure );
01515 
01516       if ( pCorpse == NULL )
01517       {
01518       #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01519             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Vaporize corpse but corpse cannot be found at: %d", sBaseGridNo );
01520       #endif
01521             return;
01522       }
01523 
01524       if ( pCorpse->def.usFlags & ROTTING_CORPSE_VEHICLE )
01525       {           
01526             return;
01527       }
01528 
01529       if ( GridNoOnScreen( sBaseGridNo ) )
01530       {
01531             // Add explosion
01532             memset( &AniParams, 0, sizeof( ANITILE_PARAMS ) );
01533             AniParams.sGridNo                                     = sBaseGridNo;
01534             AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL;
01535             AniParams.sDelay                                      = (INT16)( 80 );
01536             AniParams.sStartFrame                           = 0;
01537             AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_CACHEDTILE | ANITILE_FORWARD;
01538             AniParams.sX                                                      = CenterX( sBaseGridNo );
01539             AniParams.sY                                                      = CenterY( sBaseGridNo );
01540             AniParams.sZ                                                      = (INT16)pCorpse->def.sHeightAdjustment;
01541             
01542             strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\GEN_BLOW.STI" );
01543             CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
01544 
01545             // Remove....
01546             RemoveCorpse( pCorpse->iID );
01547             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
01548             
01549             if ( pCorpse->def.bLevel == 0 )
01550             {
01551                   // Set some blood......
01552                   SpreadEffect( sBaseGridNo, (UINT8)( ( 2 ) ), 0, NOBODY, BLOOD_SPREAD_EFFECT, 0, -1 );
01553             }
01554       }
01555 
01556       // PLay a sound....
01557       PlayJA2Sample( (UINT32)( BODY_EXPLODE_1 ), RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );                
01558       
01559 }
01560 
01561 INT16 FindNearestAvailableGridNoForCorpse( ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION *pDef, INT8 ubRadius )
01562 {
01563       INT16  sSweetGridNo;
01564       INT16  sTop, sBottom;
01565       INT16  sLeft, sRight;
01566       INT16  cnt1, cnt2, cnt3;
01567       INT16       sGridNo;
01568       INT32       uiRange, uiLowestRange = 999999;
01569       INT16       sLowestGridNo=0;
01570       INT32                         leftmost;
01571       BOOLEAN     fFound = FALSE;
01572       SOLDIERTYPE soldier;
01573       UINT8 ubSaveNPCAPBudget;
01574       UINT8 ubSaveNPCDistLimit;
01575       STRUCTURE_FILE_REF * pStructureFileRef = NULL;
01576       INT8                                zFilename[150];
01577       UINT8                               ubBestDirection=0;
01578       BOOLEAN     fSetDirection   = FALSE;
01579 
01580       cnt3 = 0;
01581 
01582       // Get root filename... this removes path and extension
01583       // USed to find struct data fo rthis corpse...
01584       GetRootName( zFilename, (INT8 *) zCorpseFilenames[pDef->ubType ] );
01585 
01586       pStructureFileRef = GetCachedTileStructureRefFromFilename( zFilename );
01587 
01588       sSweetGridNo = pDef->sGridNo;
01589 
01590 
01591       //Save AI pathing vars.  changing the distlimit restricts how 
01592       //far away the pathing will consider.
01593       ubSaveNPCAPBudget = gubNPCAPBudget;
01594       ubSaveNPCDistLimit = gubNPCDistLimit;
01595       gubNPCAPBudget = 0;
01596       gubNPCDistLimit = ubRadius;
01597 
01598       //create dummy soldier, and use the pathing to determine which nearby slots are
01599       //reachable.
01600       memset( &soldier, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
01601       soldier.bTeam = 1;
01602       soldier.sGridNo = sSweetGridNo;
01603 
01604       sTop        = ubRadius;
01605       sBottom = -ubRadius;
01606       sLeft   = - ubRadius;
01607       sRight  = ubRadius;
01608 
01609       //clear the mapelements of potential residue MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE flags
01610       //in the square region.
01611       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
01612       {
01613             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
01614             {
01615                   sGridNo = sSweetGridNo + (WORLD_COLS * cnt1) + cnt2;
01616                   if ( sGridNo >=0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX )
01617                   {
01618                         gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE);
01619                   }
01620             }
01621       }
01622 
01623       //Now, find out which of these gridnos are reachable 
01624       //(use the fake soldier and the pathing settings)
01625       FindBestPath( &soldier, NOWHERE, 0, WALKING, COPYREACHABLE, 0 );
01626       
01627       uiLowestRange = 999999; 
01628 
01629       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
01630       {
01631             leftmost = ( ( sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
01632 
01633             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
01634             {
01635                   sGridNo = sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
01636                   if ( sGridNo >=0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX && sGridNo >= leftmost && sGridNo < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) &&
01637                         gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE )
01638                   {
01639                         // Go on sweet stop
01640                         if ( NewOKDestination( &soldier, sGridNo, TRUE, soldier.bLevel ) )
01641                         {
01642                               BOOLEAN fDirectionFound = FALSE;
01643                               BOOLEAN     fCanSetDirection   = FALSE;
01644 
01645                               // Check each struct in each direction
01646                               if ( pStructureFileRef == NULL )
01647                               {
01648                                     fDirectionFound = TRUE;
01649                               }
01650                               else
01651                               {
01652                                     for( cnt3 = 0; cnt3 < 8; cnt3++ )
01653                                     {
01654                                           if ( OkayToAddStructureToWorld( (INT16)sGridNo, pDef->bLevel, &(pStructureFileRef->pDBStructureRef[gOneCDirection[ cnt3 ]]), INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID ) )
01655                                           {
01656                                                 fDirectionFound = TRUE;
01657                                                 fCanSetDirection = TRUE;
01658                                                 break;
01659                                           }
01660                                     }
01661                               }
01662 
01663                               if ( fDirectionFound )
01664                               {
01665                                     uiRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( sSweetGridNo, sGridNo );
01666 
01667                                     if ( uiRange < uiLowestRange )
01668                                     {
01669                                           if ( fCanSetDirection )
01670                                           {
01671                                                 ubBestDirection = (UINT8)cnt3;
01672                                                 fSetDirection   = TRUE;
01673                                           }
01674                                           sLowestGridNo = sGridNo;
01675                                           uiLowestRange = uiRange;
01676                                           fFound = TRUE;
01677                                     }
01678                               }
01679 
01680                         }
01681                   }
01682             }
01683       }
01684       gubNPCAPBudget = ubSaveNPCAPBudget;
01685       gubNPCDistLimit = ubSaveNPCDistLimit;
01686       if ( fFound )
01687       {
01688             if ( fSetDirection )
01689             {
01690                   pDef->bDirection = ubBestDirection;
01691             }
01692 
01693             return sLowestGridNo;
01694       }
01695       return NOWHERE;
01696 }
01697 
01698 
01699 BOOLEAN IsValidDecapitationCorpse( ROTTING_CORPSE *pCorpse )
01700 {
01701   if ( pCorpse->def.fHeadTaken )
01702   {
01703     return( FALSE );
01704   }
01705 
01706       return( gbCorpseValidForDecapitation[ pCorpse->def.ubType ] );
01707 }
01708 
01709 
01710 ROTTING_CORPSE *GetCorpseAtGridNo( INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel )
01711 {
01712       STRUCTURE                     *pStructure, *pBaseStructure;
01713       INT16                               sBaseGridNo;
01714 
01715       pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_CORPSE );
01716 
01717       if ( pStructure != NULL )
01718       {
01719             // Get base....
01720             pBaseStructure = FindBaseStructure( pStructure );
01721 
01722             // Find base gridno...
01723             sBaseGridNo = pBaseStructure->sGridNo;
01724 
01725             if ( pBaseStructure != NULL )
01726             {
01727                   return( FindCorpseBasedOnStructure( sBaseGridNo, pBaseStructure ) );
01728             }
01729       }
01730 
01731       return( NULL );
01732 }
01733 
01734 
01735 void DecapitateCorpse( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo,  INT8 bLevel )
01736 {
01737       OBJECTTYPE        Object;
01738       ROTTING_CORPSE *pCorpse;
01739       ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION CorpseDef;
01740       UINT16 usHeadIndex = HEAD_1;
01741 
01742 
01743       pCorpse = GetCorpseAtGridNo( sGridNo, bLevel );
01744 
01745       if ( pCorpse == NULL )
01746       {
01747             return;
01748       }
01749 
01750       if ( IsValidDecapitationCorpse( pCorpse ) )
01751       {
01752             // Decapitate.....
01753             // Copy corpse definition...
01754             memcpy( &CorpseDef, &(pCorpse->def), sizeof( ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION ) );
01755 
01756             // Add new one...
01757             CorpseDef.ubType = gDecapitatedCorpse[ CorpseDef.ubType ];
01758 
01759     pCorpse->def.fHeadTaken = TRUE;
01760 
01761             if ( CorpseDef.ubType != 0 )
01762             {
01763                   // Remove old one...
01764                   RemoveCorpse( pCorpse->iID );
01765 
01766                   AddRottingCorpse( &CorpseDef );
01767             }
01768 
01769             // Add head item.....
01770 
01771             // Pick the head based on profile type...
01772             switch( pCorpse->def.ubProfile )
01773             {
01774                   case 83:
01775                         usHeadIndex = HEAD_2;
01776                         break;
01777 
01778                   case 111:
01779                         usHeadIndex = HEAD_3;
01780                         break;
01781 
01782                   case 64:
01783                         usHeadIndex = HEAD_4;
01784                         break;
01785 
01786                   case 112:
01787                         usHeadIndex = HEAD_5;
01788                         break;
01789 
01790                   case 82:
01791                         usHeadIndex = HEAD_6;
01792                         break;
01793 
01794                   case 110:
01795                         usHeadIndex = HEAD_7;
01796                         break;
01797 
01798             }
01799 
01800             CreateItem( usHeadIndex, 100, &Object );
01801             AddItemToPool( sGridNo, &Object, INVISIBLE, 0, 0, 0 );
01802 
01803             // All teams lok for this...
01804             NotifySoldiersToLookforItems( );
01805       }
01806       
01807 }
01808 
01809 
01810 void GetBloodFromCorpse( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01811 {
01812       ROTTING_CORPSE *pCorpse;
01813       INT8                                bObjSlot;
01814       OBJECTTYPE              Object;
01815 
01816       // OK, get corpse
01817       pCorpse = &( gRottingCorpse[ pSoldier->uiPendingActionData4 ] );
01818 
01819       bObjSlot = FindObj( pSoldier, JAR );
01820 
01821       // What kind of corpse ami I?
01822       switch( pCorpse->def.ubType )
01823       {
01824             case ADULTMONSTER_DEAD:
01825             case INFANTMONSTER_DEAD:
01826 
01827                   // Can get creature blood....
01828                   CreateItem( JAR_CREATURE_BLOOD, 100, &Object );
01829                   break;
01830 
01831     case QUEEN_MONSTER_DEAD:
01832                   CreateItem( JAR_QUEEN_CREATURE_BLOOD, 100, &Object );
01833                   break;
01834 
01835             default:
01836 
01837                   CreateItem( JAR_HUMAN_BLOOD, 100, &Object );
01838                   break;
01839 
01840       }
01841 
01842       if ( bObjSlot != NO_SLOT )
01843       {
01844             SwapObjs( &(pSoldier->inv[ bObjSlot ] ), &Object );
01845       }
01846 }
01847 
01848 
01849 
01850 void ReduceAmmoDroppedByNonPlayerSoldiers( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 iInvSlot )
01851 {
01852       OBJECTTYPE *pObj;
01853 
01854       Assert( pSoldier );
01855       Assert( ( iInvSlot >= 0 ) && ( iInvSlot < NUM_INV_SLOTS ) );
01856 
01857       pObj = &( pSoldier->inv[ iInvSlot ] );
01858 
01859       // if not a player soldier
01860       if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
01861       {
01862             // if it's ammo
01863             if ( Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_AMMO )
01864             {
01865                   //don't drop all the clips, just a random # of them between 1 and how many there are
01866                   pObj->ubNumberOfObjects = ( UINT8 ) ( 1 + Random( pObj->ubNumberOfObjects ) );
01867                   // recalculate the weight
01868                   pObj->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pObj );
01869             }
01870       }
01871 }
01872 
01873 
01874 void LookForAndMayCommentOnSeeingCorpse( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubLevel )
01875 {
01876       ROTTING_CORPSE *pCorpse;
01877   INT8            bToleranceThreshold = 0;
01878       INT32           cnt;
01879       SOLDIERTYPE         *pTeamSoldier;
01880 
01881 
01882   if ( QuoteExp_HeadShotOnly[ pSoldier->ubProfile ] == 1 )
01883   {
01884     return;
01885   }
01886 
01887   pCorpse = GetCorpseAtGridNo( sGridNo, ubLevel );
01888 
01889   if ( pCorpse == NULL )
01890   {
01891     return;
01892   }
01893 
01894       if ( pCorpse->def.ubType != ROTTING_STAGE2 )
01895   {
01896     return;
01897   }
01898 
01899   // If servicing qrows, tolerance is now 1
01900   if ( pCorpse->def.bNumServicingCrows > 0 )
01901   {
01902     bToleranceThreshold++;
01903   }
01904 
01905   // Check tolerance
01906   if ( pSoldier->bCorpseQuoteTolerance <= bToleranceThreshold )
01907   {
01908     // Say quote...
01909             TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_HEADSHOT );                  
01910 
01911     BeginMultiPurposeLocator( sGridNo, ubLevel, FALSE );
01912 
01913     // Reset values....
01914     pSoldier->bCorpseQuoteTolerance = (INT8)( Random(3) + 1 );
01915 
01916     // 50% chance of adding 1 to other mercs....
01917     if ( Random( 2 ) == 1 )
01918     {
01919           // IF IT'S THE SELECTED GUY, MAKE ANOTHER SELECTED!
01920           cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
01921 
01922           // look for all mercs on the same team, 
01923           for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++ )
01924           { 
01925                     // ATE: Ok, lets check for some basic things here!
01926                     if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pTeamSoldier->sGridNo != NOWHERE && pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector )
01927                     {
01928           pTeamSoldier->bCorpseQuoteTolerance++;
01929         }
01930           }
01931     }
01932   }
01933 }
01934 
01935 
01936 INT16 GetGridNoOfCorpseGivenProfileID( UINT8 ubProfileID )
01937 {
01938       INT32                    cnt;
01939       ROTTING_CORPSE                             *pCorpse;
01940 
01941       // Loop through all corpses....
01942       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < giNumRottingCorpse; cnt++ )
01943       {
01944             pCorpse = &(gRottingCorpse[ cnt ] );
01945 
01946             if ( pCorpse->fActivated )
01947             {
01948       if ( pCorpse->def.ubProfile == ubProfileID )
01949       { 
01950         return( pCorpse->def.sGridNo );
01951       }
01952     }
01953   }
01954 
01955   return( NOWHERE );
01956 }
01957 
01958 void DecayRottingCorpseAIWarnings( void )
01959 {
01960       INT32                   cnt;
01961       ROTTING_CORPSE *  pCorpse;
01962 
01963       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < giNumRottingCorpse; cnt++ )
01964       {
01965             pCorpse = &(gRottingCorpse[ cnt ] );
01966 
01967             if ( pCorpse->fActivated && pCorpse->def.ubAIWarningValue > 0 )
01968             {
01969                   pCorpse->def.ubAIWarningValue--;
01970             }
01971       }
01972  
01973 }
01974 
01975 UINT8 GetNearestRottingCorpseAIWarning( INT16 sGridNo )
01976 {
01977       INT32                   cnt;
01978       ROTTING_CORPSE *  pCorpse;
01979       UINT8                   ubHighestWarning = 0;
01980 
01981       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < giNumRottingCorpse; cnt++ )
01982       {
01983             pCorpse = &(gRottingCorpse[ cnt ] );
01984 
01985             if ( pCorpse->fActivated && pCorpse->def.ubAIWarningValue > 0 )
01986             {
01987                   if ( PythSpacesAway( sGridNo, pCorpse->def.sGridNo ) <= CORPSE_WARNING_DIST )
01988                   {
01989                         if ( pCorpse->def.ubAIWarningValue > ubHighestWarning )
01990                         {
01991                               ubHighestWarning = pCorpse->def.ubAIWarningValue;
01992                         }
01993                   }
01994             }
01995       }
01996 
01997       return( ubHighestWarning );
01998 }
